wikipedia_page.main: Ian Jones (born 11 July 1980), is a British-born football player who represents Turks and Caicos Islands as a goalkeeper.

response: *Ian Jones (athlete), British bronze medal winner at the 2008 Summer Paralympics
*Ian Jones (author) (1931–2018), Australian author and film writer
*Ian Jones (footballer, born 1980), Turks and Caicos Islands football player
*Ian Jones (sportsman, born 1934), English sportsman and academic
*Ian Jones (television executive), chief executive of S4C
*Ian Jones-Quartey (born 1984), writer, storyboard artist, animator and voice actor
